# predict.mom — Parenting & Family Prediction Markets

> Real-time prediction markets for parenting & family. Bet on outcomes, see live odds, and win. Free to play with shared pools powered by Firebase.


predict.mom is a prediction market platform focused on parenting & family. Users can bet YES or NO on curated markets with real-time shared pools. Features live odds, countdown timers, trending markets, and social sharing. Part of the Predict Network — 18 niche prediction market sites.


## Pages

- [Homepage — Parenting & Family prediction markets with live odds](https://predict.mom)
- [Markets — Active parenting & family prediction markets](https://predict.mom#markets)


## Keywords

prediction market, parenting & family, betting, odds, forecast, predict.mom
